dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-pip

dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-setuptools

dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment
dependencies.name: python-venv

dependent_to.description:
A double-entry bookkeeping computer language that lets you define
financial transaction records in a text file, read them in memory,
generate a variety of reports from them, and provides a web interface..
dependent_to.name: py-beancount

dependent_to.description:
Parse C++ header files and generate a data structure representing the
class
dependent_to.name: py-cppheaderparser

dependent_to.description:
DaCe is a fast parallel programming framework that takes code in
Python/NumPy and other programming languages, and maps it to high-
performance CPU, GPU, and FPGA programs, which can be optimized
programmatically or interactively.
dependent_to.name: py-dace

dependent_to.description: Git for data scientists - manage your code and data together.
dependent_to.name: py-dvc

dependent_to.description:
Fava is a web interface for the double-entry bookkeeping software
Beancount with a focus on features and usability.
dependent_to.name: py-fava

dependent_to.description:
A final implementation of JSONPath for Python that aims to be standard
compliant, including arithmetic and binary comparison operators.
dependent_to.name: py-jsonpath-ng

dependent_to.description:
Pyomo is a Python-based open-source software package that supports a
diverse set of optimization capabilities for formulating and analyzing
optimization models.
dependent_to.name: py-pyomo

dependent_to.description: Ahead of Time compiler for numeric kernels.
dependent_to.name: py-pythran

dependent_to.description:
Qiskit is an open-source SDK for working with quantum computers at the
level of extended quantum circuits, operators, and algorithms.
dependent_to.name: py-qiskit-terra

dependent_to.description: A Python bindings generator for C/C++ libraries.
dependent_to.name: py-sip

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
